data.name: Radiance
data.tooltip:
Turns resilient and reduces damage done to the hero by <d ref="(1-duckiesHeroCarnivexEnhance_DRResponse.modify_fraction)*100" style="Bold"/><Bold>%</> for <d ref="duckiesHeroCarnivexEnhance_Buff.duration"/> seconds.

While effect is active every attack is a cleave.
